g.text: and list of companies to request referrals
Notify them that they are eligble
Wait for Pratik actually having free time
Wait for Referrer to look at request
[if Referrer wants to give referral to Requester]
[if Referrer wants to directly talk with Requester]
Notify about how to finalize the company specific referral process
Request Pratik to send final referral steps
